fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Primordial Jade Cutter, Mistsplitter Reforged, The Black Sword, Lion's Roar, Amenona

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Gladiator's Finale <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• ATK +18%.
• If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Heart of Depth <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Hydro DMG Bonus +15%
• After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Shimenawa's Reminiscence <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• ATK +18%
• When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s.

fields.name: Stat Priority
fields.value:

<:sandsofeon:957412516038844486> ATK %
<:gobletofeonothem:957412513958477864> Hydro DMG Bonus %
<:circletoflogos:957412513820053594> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate
**Substats**
・ATK %
・Energy Recharge
・CRIT DMG
・CRIT Rate
・HP %

fields.name: Talent Priority:
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Kamisato Art- Kyouka
**2)** Elemental Burst: Kamisato Art- Suiyuu
**3)** Normal Attack: Kamisato Art- Marobashi

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Amenona weapon is NOT recommended for Kamisato Ayato when you are running **4-Piece Shimenawa's Reminiscence**
